trans-unit.source: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.
trans-unit.target: 指定對應至磁碟上的字型檔案的實體字型。

trans-unit.source: The GlyphTypeface object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document.
trans-unit.target: GlyphTypeface 物件是記憶體的低層級文字物件所表示的 OpenType 字型檔案，對應至單一的字型家族字體或序列化為的文件中區塊。

trans-unit.source: The correct GlyphTypeface to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> objects generated by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的邏輯字型中的字元執行正確的 GlyphTypeface 通常由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字型系統而且已記錄在<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>所產生的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>列格式化文字和物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>

trans-unit.source: The GlyphTypeface provides properties and methods for: - Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size.
trans-unit.target: GlyphTypeface 提供屬性和方法:-取得字型通用度量，例如的高度和深度的 em 大小比例。

trans-unit.source: - Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs.
trans-unit.target: -取得度量、 大綱，以及個別圖像 （glyph） 的點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: - Serialization in a document.
trans-unit.target: -序列化文件中。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the GlyphTypeface object provides.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單描述應用程式案例，說明使用 GlyphTypeface 物件所提供的低層級控制項的值的類型。

trans-unit.source: - A fixed format document generator may use the GlyphTypeface to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - A printer driver may use the GlyphTypeface to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer.
trans-unit.target: -固定的格式文件產生器可能會內嵌在文件容器中取得字型的二進位映像使用 GlyphTypeface-印表機驅動程式可能使用 GlyphTypeface 來取得字型字符外框或點陣圖或傳送到印表機的整個字型映像。

trans-unit.source: - A GlyphTypeface viewer application may use the GlyphTypeface to obtain metric and bitmap information.
trans-unit.target: -A GlyphTypeface 檢視器應用程式可能使用 GlyphTypeface 取得度量和點陣圖的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
trans-unit.target: 每個字符定義指定如何使其與對齊其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>的度量

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 下圖會定義圖像 （glyph） 字元的度量值。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") Metric values of glyph characters ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: ![圖像度量作圖器](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "圖像度量作圖器")度量值的字元字符 # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> class using the specified font file location.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>類別使用指定的字型檔案位置。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>

trans-unit.source: The constructed <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object does not use style simulations.
trans-unit.target: 建構<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件不會使用樣式模擬。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定字型檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> class using the specified font file location and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>類別使用指定的字型檔案位置和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定字型檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the advance heights for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得圖像 （glyph） 所表示遞增高度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The AdvanceHeights property is used for calculating vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: AdvanceHeights 屬性用來計算垂直版面配置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs that represents advance height information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵-值配對的圖像 （glyph） 該代表提前高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the advance height.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>，代表提前高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the advance widths for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得提前寬度所代表的圖像<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A> property is used for calculating horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A>屬性用來計算水平配置。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represents advance width information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組的圖像 （glyph） 該代表提前寬度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the advance width.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示遞增寬度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的基準值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The baseline value represents the distance from cell top to English baseline relative to em size.
trans-unit.target: 基準值表示相對於 em 大小英文基準從儲存格上方之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double> that represents the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref:System.Double>表示基準。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得圖像 （glyph） 所表示之進階向量的最底部結尾從黑箱下邊緣的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The BottomSideBearings value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱下的邊緣時換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內，BottomSideBearings 值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。

trans-unit.source: The BottomSideBearings value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱下的邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形時，負 BottomSideBearings 值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示之間的距離。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital, relative to em size, for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得距離與基準之間的英文大寫字母，相對於 em 大小頂端<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，指出與基準之間的距離，英文大寫字母，表示字型的 em 大小的比例的頂端。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the nominal mapping of a Unicode code point to a glyph index as defined by the font 'CMAP' table.
trans-unit.target: 取得表面對應的 Unicode 字碼指標圖像索引字型 'CMAP' 資料表所定義。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains the mapping of a Unicode code points to glyph indices for all glyphs in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含 Unicode 程式碼的對應指向圖像索引中的所有圖像<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the binary image of the font subset based on a specified collection of glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 傳回根據指定的集合，這些圖像字型子集的二進位映像。

trans-unit.source: The collection of glyph indices to be included in the subset.
trans-unit.target: 要包含的子集中的圖像索引集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that represents the binary image of the font subset.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>陣列，表示字型子集的二進位映像。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the copyright information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得的著作權資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Copyrights property is separate from the trademark information that is access by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 著作權屬性是分開所存取之商標資訊<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent copyright information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組表示著作權資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a copyright information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為著作權資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The description information for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object can include revision notes, usage recommendations, history, features, as well as other information.
trans-unit.target: 描述資訊<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件可以包含版本資訊、 使用方式建議、 歷程記錄、 功能，以及其他資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，包含索引鍵/值組的索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a description information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為描述資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具的資訊如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent designer information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表設計工具的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a designer information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為設計工具資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer URL information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具的 URL 資訊的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent designer information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表設計工具的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that references a designer URL.
trans-unit.target: 值會參考設計工具的字串 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset value from the horizontal Western baseline to the bottom of the glyph black box for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得水平西歐基準的位移的值所代表的圖像圖像黑色方塊的底部<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent offsets for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組，代表圖像 （glyph） 的位移。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset value.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示位移的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font embedding permission for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得字型內嵌權限<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingRight"></xref> values that represents the font embedding permission
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingRight"></xref>值，表示字型內嵌權限

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> objects are considered equal if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.StyleSimulations%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件會被視為相等，如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.StyleSimulations%2A>屬性是否相等。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.StyleSimulations%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要與目前比較<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if o is a and is equal to the current ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if o is a and is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the face name for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得的字體名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the font file does not provide a name for the specified language, the FaceNames property returns the face name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型檔案不會提供指定之語言的名稱，FaceNames 屬性會傳回英文的字樣名稱。

trans-unit.source: The face name may identify weight, style, and/or stretch information.
trans-unit.target: 字體名稱可能會識別粗細、 樣式，及/或自動縮放資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent face name information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表字體名稱資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string containing the face name.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，包含的字樣名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the family name for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得家族名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the font file does not provide a family name for the specified language, the FamilyNames property returns the family name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型檔案中沒有提供指定之語言的系列名稱，FamilyNames 屬性會傳回英文版的系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The family name excludes weight, style, and stretch information.
trans-unit.target: 系列名稱不會包含粗細，樣式和自動縮放資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent family name information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表系列名稱資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string containing the family name.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，包含該系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the font file stream represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字型檔案資料流，由<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> value that represents the font file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>值，表示字型檔案。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> value describing the path for a single glyph in the font.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>值，描述字型中的單一影像的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path represents the glyph without grid fitting applied for rendering at a specific resolution.
trans-unit.target: 路徑所表示沒有套用指定的解析度轉譯格線調整圖像。

trans-unit.source: The index of the glyph to get the outline for.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的外框的圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The font size in drawing surface units.
trans-unit.target: 在 繪圖介面單位字型大小。

trans-unit.source: The size to hint for in points.
trans-unit.target: 要提示以點為單位的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> value that represents the path of the glyph.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>值，表示圖像 （glyph） 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 做為雜湊函式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of glyphs for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得圖像 （glyph） 的數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The total number of glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 圖像 （glyph） 的總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the character cell relative to the em size.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於 em 大小的字元儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Double> value that represents the height of the character cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>值，表示字元儲存格的高度。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the leading end of the advance vector to the left edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得從前進向量結尾開頭到所代表的圖像上黑色方塊的左邊緣的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The LeftSideBearings value is positive when the left edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱左邊的緣時換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內，LeftSideBearings 值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The LeftSideBearings value is negative when the left edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱左邊的緣 overhangs 對齊矩形時，負 LeftSideBearings 值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表圖像的距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示之間的距離。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the font license description information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得字型授權描述資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs font license information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組字型的授權資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the font license information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述字型的授權資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font manufacturer information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得字型製造商資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs for the font manufacturer information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>字型製造廠商資訊的物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the font manufacturer information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述字型的製造商資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the right edge of the black box to the right end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得從黑箱右邊緣的距離，右端的圖像所代表之進階向量<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The RightSideBearings value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱尾端邊緣時換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內，RightSideBearings 值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The RightSideBearings value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 黑箱右邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形時，負 RightSideBearings 值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示之間的距離。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the sample text information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得的範例文字資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The SampleTexts value can be the font name, or any other text that the designer thinks is the best sample to display the font in.
trans-unit.target: SampleTexts 值可以是字型名稱或設計工具可讓您認為最佳範例會顯示該字型中的任何其他文字。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs sample text information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組範例文字資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the sample text information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述的範例文字資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> value that represents the font stretch.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>表示字型縮放值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與基準之間的距離字樣帶有刪除線。

trans-unit.source: The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 刪除線的位置值是通常是正數的因為刪除線通常高於基準。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the strikethrough position.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>表示刪除線位置。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the strikethrough relative to the font em size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出相對於字型的 em 大小刪除線的粗細。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>，指出刪除線的粗細，表示字型的 em 大小的比例。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyle"></xref> value that represents the style value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FontStyle"> </xref>值，表示樣式值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref> values that represents the style simulation for the font.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations"></xref>值，表示字型樣式模擬。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> font conforms to Unicode encoding.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>字型符合 Unicode 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The font may be considered as a simple collection of symbols indexed by a code point.
trans-unit.target: 字型可能會被視為符號的字碼指標以編製索引的簡單集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the font conforms to Unicode encoding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字型符合 Unicode 編碼方式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top end of the vertical advance vector to the top edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得從垂直進階向量的最上方結尾所代表的圖像上黑色方塊的上邊緣的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The TopSideBearings value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: TopSideBearings 值為正數，黑色方塊的上邊緣時的進階高度和字型儲存格高度來定義對齊矩形內。

trans-unit.source: The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。

trans-unit.source: The TopSideBearings value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 當黑色方塊的上邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形，TopSideBearings 數值為負。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.UInt16> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.UInt16>可識別圖像索引。</xref:System.UInt16>

trans-unit.source: The value is a <xref:System.Double> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref:System.Double>表示之間的距離。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the trademark notice information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得商標聲明資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Trademarks property is separate from the copyright information that is access by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 商標屬性是分開所存取之著作權資訊<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent trademark notice information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表商標通知資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that the trademark notice information.
trans-unit.target: 值是表示商標注意事項資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the underline in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得位置中的底線<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size.
trans-unit.target: 底線位置是相對於基準和相對於 em 大小。

trans-unit.source: The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的位置值是通常是負的因為底線通常是低於基準。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the position of the underline.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>值，表示底線的位置。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness of the underline relative to em size.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於 em 大小，底線的厚度。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值

trans-unit.source: Gets the vendor URL information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得供應商的 URL 資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.
trans-unit.target: 字型廠商可以將唯一的序號內嵌在 URL 中，然後可以用來登錄該字型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent vendor URL information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表供應商的 URL 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that references a vendor URL.
trans-unit.target: 值為參考供應商的 URL 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font face version interpreted from the font's 'NAME' table.
trans-unit.target: 取得解譯字型的 'NAME' 資料表中的字型版本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value that represents the version.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>代表版本的值。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version string information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object interpreted from the font's 'NAME' table.
trans-unit.target: 取得版本字串資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>解譯字型的 'NAME' 資料表中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Version strings vary significantly in format.
trans-unit.target: 版本字串會大大地改變格式。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the version as a numeric value, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Version%2A>—do not attempt to parse the value of the VersionStrings property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得以數值形式的版本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Version%2A>— 請勿嘗試剖析 VersionStrings 屬性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Version%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent version string information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表版本字串資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the version.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，代表版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designed weight of the font represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計所代表之字型的粗細<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref> that represents the font weight.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<xref href="System.Windows.FontWeight"></xref>表示字型粗細。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Win32 字體名稱所代表的字型<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型未提供指定之語言的名稱，它會傳回英文版的字樣名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.
trans-unit.target: Win32 字體名稱可識別加權 （而不是一般或粗體顯示），及/或樣式，但是不會識別 stretch 或是其他的加權。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含代表 Win32 字體名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.
trans-unit.target: 值為表示 Win32 字體名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Win32 系列名稱所代表的字型<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the Win32FamilyNames property returns the family name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型未指定語言提供一個系列名稱，Win32FamilyNames 屬性會傳回英文的系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
trans-unit.target: Win32 系列名稱排除規則或粗體加權和樣式，但包含其他的粗細和自動縮放。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>物件，其中包含代表 Win32 系列名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件，可識別文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.
trans-unit.target: 值為表示 Win32 系列名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Western x-height relative to em size for the font represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於 em 大小西歐 x-height 所代表的字型<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>值
